10.title: Family Leaves Florida for Alabama's Ono Island

11.title: Engaged Couple Moves from Mainland to Mustang Island
11.plot: Tyler and Julie fell in love on Mustang Island, Texas, and are having their wedding there. The couple also wants to buy a house for themselves with enough space for friends to stay when they visit.

12.title: Family of Six Makes Move from Dallas to South Padre Island
12.plot: Phillip and Melissa are ready to leave city life behind in Dallas and have settled on South Padre Island, Texas. They want to be close to the beach and enjoy the small-town feel of the island.

13.title: New Job Motivates a Move from Fort Mill to Daniel Island
13.plot: Mike and Kendra have taken new jobs on Daniel Island, SC. They bringing their two children along and are ready to enjoy the sandy beaches and laid-back lifestyle as a family.

14.title: Couple Longs for Permanent Vacation on South Padre Island
14.plot: World travelers Jim and Helen grew up near South Padre Island, TX. They are looking for a home where they can enjoy the warm waters and sandy beaches they fondly remember from their childhood.

1.title: Returning to St. Simons Island
1.plot: A family with adventurous daughters is moving to St. Simons Island, Georgia, to pursue an outdoor lifestyle. They're looking for a home where they can relax among the live oaks and tranquil marshes while enjoying the ocean breeze.

2.title: Charleston to Edisto Island, SC
2.plot: A couple is leaving behind the hustle and bustle of Charleston, SC, for the quiet beaches of nearby Edisto Island. They both want a home with gorgeous views where they can lead a simpler lifestyle and find more time to golf.

3.title: Atlanta to Daufuskie Island, SC
3.plot: Melissa and Opie are ready to ditch the Atlanta city life for a quiet place to raise their two young kids. They are ready to start the next chapter in their lives by living alongside nature on Daufuskie Island, SC.

4.title: Michigan to Hilton Head Island, SC
4.plot: A Michigan family is trading their snow boots for sandals on Hilton Head Island, SC. While the kids love the outdoor life and water sports on the island, Michelle and Steve are using their large wish list to find the right home.

5.title: From Austin to Port Aransas, Texas
5.plot: Newlyweds Laurie, Chad and their dog Duck want to leave the big city of Austin and start the next chapter of their lives in Port Aransas, Texas. They're looking for the perfect condo with a boat dock and room for visitors.

6.title: North Texas to South Padre Island
6.plot: A family of five is determined to leave inland Texas, so they head to South Padre Island for a more outdoor lifestyle. They're looking for a condo where their growing kids can get away from technology and enjoy fun in the sun.

7.title: From San Diego to Coronado
7.plot: Heather, Drew and their two young sons live in San Diego but dream of moving across the bay to Coronado Island. They're excited to find the quintessential Coronado house with enough room to entertain but close to the boys' school.

8.title: Colorado Cold to Coronado Sun
8.plot: When Brian got stationed at the historic Naval Base Coronado, his family decided to put down roots on this exquisite southern California peninsula. Now they just need to find the perfect property to call their forever island home.

9.title: Baby on Board on Duck Island
9.plot: Expectant parents are eager to move from Raleigh, NC, to the quaint town of Duck on the Outer Banks. The couple loves the family-friendly atmosphere of Duck, so they want a large home that's close to both the beach and town.

10.title: From SoCal to Kill Devil Hills
10.plot: California natives Todd and Deanna fell in love with the island lifestyle on the Outer Banks in North Carolina. Now they want to find a permanent home with a waterfront view in their favorite vacation spot, Kill Devil Hills.

11.title: First Home on Hilton Head
11.plot: Michigan native Holly is a 27-year-old hospitality manager who wants to trade rough winters for endless summers in Hilton Head, SC. With the help of her mom, Debbie, Holly hopes to find a home with enough room for guests.

12.title: Family Time on St. Simons
12.plot: Atlanta couple Joy and Brett are looking for a slower pace of life to spend time with their five kids. They set their sights on St. Simons Island, a little paradise off of Georgia's Golden Coast.

13.title: Setting Sail to Ono Island
13.plot: Mark and Charlotte stumbled upon Ono Island, Alabama, while visiting family on the Gulf Shores and they fell in love with the undeveloped island. They're finally ready to make their favorite vacation destination a permanent home.

14.title: Planting Roots on Ono Island
14.plot: Lance and Elizabeth want to start a family in the private community of Ono Island, Alabama. Ono's small town vibes and quaint beach community fit their vision of Southern living, so they're hoping to find their forever house.

1.title: Family Time on Camano Island
1.plot: Rita and Cam want to move their blended family of five kids to laid-back Camano Island. They're excited about the tight-knit community and wide range of outdoor activities. Now they just need find a spacious island home for seven.

2.title: Rocking Out on Camano Island
2.plot: Michael and Elizabeth are in a rock band and they're grandparents! They've decided to move from the dry heat of SoCal to the lush greenery of Camano Island, WA. She wants the beach, he wants trees and they both want studio space.

3.title: From Seattle to Whidbey Island
3.plot: After raising three boys in Seattle, Jacquie and Jay are looking for a slower pace of living on Whidbey Island. The scenic views and close proximity to the city make it ideal, especially if they can find a house to suit them both.

4.title: Room to Grow on Whidbey Island
4.plot: Two young professionals love the city of Seattle, but they love fresh air and open spaces even more. They're drawn to Whidbey Island, Washington, for its vast nature and big water views -- and also it's lower home prices.

5.title: From Brooklyn to Fire Island
5.plot: A family with three young children in Brooklyn, New York, is getting tired of the city's hustle and bustle. They fell in love with Fire Island and now want a property that will give them the freedom to explore the outdoors.

6.title: Returning to Shelter Island
6.plot: After spending childhood summers on Shelter Island, NY, Liss now wants to return to share the same experience with her two boys and fulfill her love of sailing once again.

7.title: Family of Four Moves from the Mainland to Aquidneck Island
7.plot: A young family of four is running out of space in their small apartment in Rhode Island. They've focused their search on the family-oriented location of Aquidneck Island, where they hope to find a beach house with a large yard.

8.title: A New Life in Scenic Newport
8.plot: After dating long distance for two years, a young couple is finally ready to move in together in Newport, Rhode Island. A local broker is on the hunt to find them a home with a large backyard for their beloved dog.

9.title: Moving to Martha's Vineyard
9.plot: Longtime visitors make their dream of owning a home on the Martha's Vineyard that they can one day pass on to their young daughters come true.

10.title: A Nantucket for All Seasons
10.plot: After spending every summer on Nantucket for 25 years, a couple is ready to turn their summer getaway into a permanent home.

11.title: A Forever Home in Duck, NC
11.plot: After vacationing in Duck, NC, for the last 20 years, a family is ready to call the Outer Banks home. They enlist a local realtor to find a four-bedroom house with beautiful ocean views so they can live the permanent vacation.

12.title: Boating Paradise on Roanoke
12.plot: Tired of their work, eat, sleep and repeat lifestyle, a couple decides to move to Roanoke Island, NC. The avid boaters hunt for a large house with a magnificent view, a yard close to the sound and plenty of room for their beagle.

13.title: Trading Skyline for Shoreline
13.plot: John and Megan enjoy the hip urban life of Richmond, Virginia, but now they are ready to start living a quieter life closer to parks and the ocean. When a job opportunity comes up on Mount Desert island, they jump at the chance.

14.title: Manhattan to East Hampton
14.plot: A young Manhattan family leaves behind skyscrapers for the sand dunes of East Hampton, NY. With the help of a local realtor, they look for the perfect blend of country and beach to fulfill their home dreams.

1.title: Dropping Anchor on Vinalhaven, Maine
1.plot: After sailing up and down the East Coast on their boat, Jonathan, Lily and their four children have fallen in love with Vinalhaven, Maine, and are ready to finally set down roots there.

2.title: Room to Grow on Vinalhaven, Maine
2.plot: A couple that grew up on the island of Vinalhaven in Maine is ready to return to the area where they were raised, but they must find a larger house for them and their three growing boys.

3.title: From Landlocked to Island Life
3.plot: A thrill-seeking couple in landlocked Davis, CA, are sick of being stuck in a small college town. After discovering Alameda Island, CA, on a recent bungee jumping trip, they are ready to take the leap and live the island life.

4.title: Honeymooning for Life
4.plot: A young couple looks to escape big-city life by moving to Martha's Vineyard, the island where they honeymooned. With future children in mind, they hire a local real estate agent to help them find their dream home.

5.title: Connecticut Family Becomes Part of the Community on Nantucket Island
5.plot: A Connecticut family is relocating to Nantucket to open a second art gallery. Their real estate agent is on board to help them find a large home close to downtown and the beach, but will the island be good for business?

6.title: Long Live Long Beach Island
6.plot: A New York couple and their four kids are ready to find a permanent home on the Jersey Shore. With the help of their agent, the couple hopes to find a home within walking distance to the beach.

7.title: Long Beach Island Living
7.plot: A couple finally has the opportunity to fulfill their dream of living on Long Beach Island. She would like a home on the water, but they'll take any water views as long as they can live the relaxed, beach lifestyle.

8.title: Slowing Down on Carolina Beach
8.plot: A family with a 5-year-old is living a hectic lifestyle in Raleigh, North Carolina. After visiting Carolina Beach, a classic beach town on a barrier island, they're excited to get more out of life and keep their daughter smiling.

9.title: A New Life for Newlyweds in Carolina Beach, NC
9.plot: Josh and Stephanie have lived near water since they were born, and now that they are getting married, moving to be near water only makes good sense. The beautiful views of Washington State's San Juan Islands are calling them home.

10.title: Coming Back Home to Sunny Key West, Florida
10.plot: As newlyweds, Nesward and his wife Jackie, lived in Alaska for his job with the Coast Guard. After three children and a stint in Hawaii, they want to return to live on Kodiak Island, Alaska with its distinct seasons and wildlife.

11.title: Texas Family Finds Fishing Oasis in Islamorada, Florida
11.plot: A family of four avid fishermen are tired of living in landlocked Flower Mound, Texas, and are on the hunt for a forever home in their favorite vacation destination of Islamorada, Florida.

12.title: Atlanta Couple Makes Their Own Paradise on St. Simons Island
12.plot: An Atlanta couple trades in their fast-paced and stressful life in the big city for the relaxation and great outdoor lifestyle of St. Simons Island, GA.

13.title: Georgia Couple Gets Back to Living an Active Lifestyle on St. Simons Island
13.plot: A couple hopes to take advantage of the many activities on St. Simons Island, Georgia, to help them get back to their formerly active lifestyle. They're looking for a dream condo that's both close to town and near the beach.

14.title: Ocean Views on Isle of Palms, South Carolina
14.plot: A family of seven from Aiken, SC, is eager for a slower pace of life on Isle of Palms, SC. Their motto is, "If you can't see the beach, it isn't a beach house," so they're on the hunt for the perfect home with ocean views.

0.title: Family Fun on Isle of Palms
0.plot: A couple with four kids and a hectic life in St. Louis jumps at the chance to relocate and raise their kids on Isle of Palms, SC. They hope to find a home close to the beach with four bedrooms, a large backyard and a pool.

1.title: Entertaining Guests on Isle of Palms
1.plot: After vacationing and hosting their wedding reception there, a couple decides to move to Isle of Palms, SC. They hope to find a home with space for entertaining and a fenced-in yard for their dog within their $2 million budget.

2.title: Trading Cold Winters for Easy Living in Key Largo
2.plot: After honeymooning in the Florida Keys, a couple decides to trade Pittsburgh winters for life in the sun. They hunt for a home with the right amount of charm in Key Largo, Florida, where they can raise their 3-year-old daughter.

3.title: Family Moves Down the Florida Keys to Plantation Key
3.plot: A Florida family that's tired of Key Largo's traffic and lack of outdoor activities is moving farther south to Plantation Key. They hope to find a home within walking distance to a school that has space for a camper and boat.

4.title: Couple Raised on Marco Island, FL, Leaves the Mainland and Returns to Island Living
4.plot: Newlyweds are ready to return to the natural beauty and slow pace of their hometown on Marco Island in Florida. They hope to find the perfect home to start the next chapter of their lives in a familiar territory.

6.title: Outdoor Living on Skidaway
6.plot: A couple and their three kids are ready to leave the crowded city of Savannah to get back to nature on Skidaway Island, Georgia. They're on the hunt for the perfect family home that has plenty of outdoor space.

7.title: Change of Pace on James Island
7.plot: A young couple is ready for a change from their busy Pennsylvania hometown and decide to relocate to James Island, SC. The small island is perfect for relaxing and the couple hopes to find a spacious home with a big backyard.

8.title: Surf's Up on Topsail Island
8.plot: Empty nesters that vacationed on Topsail Island, NC, for years are ready to make a permanent move to the quaint island they love. They look for a move-in ready, beachfront home that will accommodate their family when they visit.

11.title: Ditching DC for Merritt Island
11.plot: A Washington, D.C., couple wants to leave the congestion and rat race of the city for waterfront living on Merritt Island, FL. They enlist an agent to help them find a home with a dock, a large yard and at least three bedrooms.

12.title: A View from Hutchinson Island
12.plot: A couple and their daughters have an active life in Port St. Lucie, FL, but after years of trips to nearby Hutchinson Island, the family is ready to find the perfect home to make the beach part of their daily life.

13.title: Fresh Start in Gulf Shores, AL
13.plot: After eight years in the Army, Amy is ready to trade combat boots for flip flops. She checked out Gulf Shores, AL, and fell in love with its small-town charm, and now she's on the hunt for a condo that's close to the beach.

14.title: New Beginnings on Orange Beach
14.plot: A young woman is tired of her quiet life and wants to look for a new career and home in Orange Beach, Alabama. She enlists an agent to not only find her dream home, but to also be her guide to everything the city has to offer.

16.title: Relaxing on Topsail Island, NC
16.plot: A family of four leads a hectic life in Trenton, North Carolina. Now they're looking to relax by trading in life on the farm and making a permanent move to their favorite vacation spot, Topsail Island, North Carolina.

30.title: From Utah to Merritt Island
30.plot: A couple decides to live the life they've always wanted by trading the mountains of Utah for the beaches of Merritt Island, Florida. They hunt for a dream home where they and their four kids can enjoy miles of beach and nature.

1.title: Moving Back to Merritt Island
1.plot: A Florida family moves back to their hometown hoping to find a home with a large backyard and pool where the entire family can relax together.

2.title: Blast Off to Merritt Island
2.plot: A couple with three kids recaptures their idyllic childhood by moving into a larger home near their jobs on Merritt Island, FL.

3.title: Reminiscing on Oak Island
3.plot: A couple returns to their roots with a beach home on the laid-back oasis of Oak Island, NC.

4.title: Cast a Line on Oak Island
4.plot: An Ohio couple decides to move to Oak Island, NC, to spend more time together. The affordability of the area makes them eager to find the perfect home for this new chapter in their lives.

5.title: From Houston to Tiki Island
5.plot: A Houston couple and their two sons look for a large waterfront home with room for their boat on Tiki Island, TX.

6.title: From City Life to Tiki Island Life
6.plot: A Houston couple wants to leave the concrete jungle behind and live closer to the water. They set off to find the perfect home on Tiki Island, TX.

8.title: The Ultimate South Padre Home
8.plot: A Houston couple looks to escape the city life and enjoy the beautiful beaches, outdoor sports and laid-back lifestyle of South Padre Island, Texas, in their ultimate dream home.

9.title: Settling Down in Cocoa Beach
9.plot: A globe-trotting couple is looking to find a place to settle down and raise their daughters. Wanting to stay close to the ocean, they enlist an agent to help find their permanent paradise in Cocoa Beach, Florida.

10.title: New England to Merritt Island
10.plot: A family of four looks to escape cold Massachusetts winters to spend more time together outdoors on Merritt Island, Florida. They task a local broker with finding a waterfront home with a pool that suits their needs.

11.title: Young Couple Leaves Busy Atlanta for Quiet Amelia Island
11.plot: Tired of the busy city life, a young couple from Atlanta decides to make Amelia Island, FL, their new home. He would love to fix up an old house, but she prefers a hassle-free new construction home.

12.plot:

14.title: Heading South to Hilton Head
14.plot: A busy Pennsylvania family hopes to leave their hectic lives behind and live a simpler life in Hilton Head, South Carolina.

15.title: Splash Down on North Padre
15.plot: A military couple has a dream to settle down on North Padre Island with their two children. They hope their agent can find them a home with easy beach access and a boat slip.

1.title: Working Hard for the Hamptons
1.plot: A career-driven couple is looking to make the leap from Greenwich, Connecticut, to their island fantasy destination of East Hampton, New York, where they can finally enjoy the fruits of their labor and live their island life.

2.title: Reliving Childhood Memories on Martha's Vineyard
2.plot: A woman has dreamed of owning an island home on Martha's Vineyard ever since she was a child. Now she and her husband hope to raise their 2-year-old daughter on the island and own a piece of paradise.

3.title: Bachelor Pad in Newport, Rhode Island
3.plot: A Boston accountant wants to escape the hectic city life by finding a beach getaway. He grew up visiting Aquidneck Island, RI, and now he wants to find a bachelor pad near the water and downtown Newport where he can relax.

4.title: Set Sail for Aquidneck Island
4.plot: After spending most of their lives at sea, a couple takes their kids to Aquidneck Island in Narragansett Bay hoping to find a turn-key home close to the beach.

5.title: Dreaming of South Padre Island
5.plot: A Texas couple is ready to start a new chapter by buying a home on South Padre Island where they can ditch their hectic lifestyle for tranquility and adventure.

6.title: From Childhood Vactions to Permanent Paradise on Mustang Island
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Making Memories on Nantucket
7.plot: After spending summers on the island, a couple sets out to make their dream come true and find a forever home on Nantucket. They each have memories of growing up there and want to share the same experiences with their daughters.

8.title: From the City to the Vineyard
8.plot: After years of visiting the island to relax and decompress, a Boston couple is ready to buy their dream home on Martha's Vineyard. They're looking for a home where they can enjoy the island's lifestyle and host visiting family.

9.title: New Beginnings on on Camano Island, WA
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Slower Pace on Camano Island
10.plot: A couple living in a busy Seattle suburb wants to slow down and focus on each other. He sold her on an easy commute to work from Camano Island, WA, and now they hope to find an open-concept home where they can entertain family.

11.title: Waking Up in a No-Wake Zone
11.plot: A couple is tired of their boring lifestyle in Urbana, Ohio, and wants to liven things up on Indian Lake. They hope to find a large turnkey home with space for extended family, as well as a dock for the boat he's always wanted.

12.title: Coming Home to Indian Lake
12.plot: A couple has grown tired of hectic city life and is anxious to return to their hometown of Indian Lake, OH. Both are able to work remotely, so they're heading back to their old stomping grounds to find the perfect dream home.

13.title: Salty Air on Sullivan's Island
13.plot: An Atlanta couple leaves the busy city behind for a more peaceful life on the beaches of Sullivan's Island, SC.

14.title: Family Home on Hilton Head
14.plot: As their daughters get older, Georgia residents Lisa and Kevin are looking for a change of pace from their busy lives. They're looking for a home in Hilton Head, SC, that their kids will always want to return to.

1.title: Historical Charm in Key West
1.plot: A couple is leaving the mountains and cold of Boone, NC, behind for a new job in sunny Key West, FL. They're excited to embrace eclectic charm of the island, but they will have to chose between character and convenience.

2.title: Mom and Son Move to Key West
2.plot: A single mom wants to trade the New Jersey traffic for a bike commute on Key West. She's hoping to find a turnkey home with a big backyard, while her six-year-old's wish list includes a pool, a beach and boat.

3.title: Ocean Breeze on Topsail Island
3.plot: After years of vacationing on Topsail Island, NC, an NYC family is ready to start living the island life full-time. The calm and relaxing beaches are a breath of fresh air, and flexible careers are making this dream a reality.

4.title: Home with a View on Topsail
4.plot: Empty nesters who have been visiting Topsail Island, North Carolina, for more than 20 years are ready to relocate permanently. Their hometown is becoming congested, so it's the perfect time to make the move to an oceanfront condo.

5.title: Fixer Upper on Fidalgo Island
5.plot: A couple with construction experience wants a fixer upper on Fidalgo Island, WA. They're ready to trade long commutes in Seattle for a more active lifestyle on the island, where they can enjoy the view and hiking trails.

6.title: Adventure on Anderson Island
6.plot: A Washington couple wants to trade their lifestyle in Tacoma for one that's more fun and adventurous on Anderson Island. They love the seclusion of the peaceful island and the outdoor activities it has to offer.

7.title: Absolutely Amelia Island
7.plot: A pediatric doctor is ready to escape the sprawl of Los Angeles and find the perfect beach home on Amelia Island, Florida. An East Coast native who moved west for medical school, she wants to be closer to her family.

8.title: Trading the Desert for the Beach
8.plot: North Carolina natives want to move from Phoenix back east to Topsail Island, NC. Their desert city is just too big, too busy and, most importantly, too far from the beach, so they're looking for an oceanfront dream home.

9.title: Alabama Couple Trades Farming for Boating on Ono Island
9.plot: A couple leaves the cattle farm for a laidback life on Alabama's Ono Island. They love the quiet atmosphere and proximity to the Gulf Shores, but the challenge will be finding a house that fits their very particular wish list.

10.title: Trading Iowa Corn Fields for Sugar Sand Beaches in Gulf Shores, Alabama
10.plot: An Iowa family wants to enjoy year-long outdoor activities and bring their restaurant business to Gulf Shores, Alabama. They hope to find a house close to the beach with bedrooms for everyone and room in the backyard for a pool.

11.title: Returning to the Peace and Serenity of Ohio's Bass Islands
11.plot: A Florida family looks to return to the restful Bass Islands of Ohio's Lake Erie, a destination her family has visited for many years. They'll have to decide how much their privacy and desire for water views are really worth.

12.title: Wedding Location Becomes Home on South Bass Island
12.plot: A MI couple looks for a new home on the OH island where they got married.

13.title: Teeing Off on Topsail Island, NC
13.plot: College sweethearts who have always dreamed of having a home on the beach are in love with Topsail Island, NC. They hope to find a large, move-in ready house that offers plenty of space for family gatherings with their adult sons.

14.title: Finding a Gem on Emerald Isle
14.plot: After visiting Emerald Isle, NC, on vacation with their kids, a couple is ready to leave Wake Forest, NC, and move to the beach full-time. They are determined to find a place of their own where every day feels like a holiday.

1.title: Lawyers Move to Long Beach for Active Lifestyle
1.plot: An active couple from Brooklyn is ready to escape their monotonous routine and the daily grind of city life by finding a permanent home in nearby Long Beach, NY.

2.title: Looking for a Shore Thing on Absecon Island
2.plot: A New Jersey father who grew up on Absecon Island wants to share his love of the Jersey Shore with his family in a dream home near the ocean.

3.title: Brews and Views on San Juan Island, WA
3.plot: Newlyweds search for a fixer-upper property with water views and space for their dogs near family in San Juan Island, WA.

4.title: Salt Lake to San Juan Island
4.plot: When Chris gets a chance to relocate for work and cut his traveling time, he and wife Laura, who works from home, jump at the chance. They chose the Pacific Northwest's coastal San Juan Islands to live and raise their son.

5.title: Dropping Anchor on Block Island
5.plot: A Connecticut charter-boat captain who has been visiting Rhode Island's Block Island since he was young is ready to make his childhood dreams come true and move to the island full-time.

6.title: Bay or Beach on Brigantine, NJ
6.plot: A family of four searches for a home in the quiet town of Brigantine, NJ, but their biggest dilemma is choosing between living bayside or beachside.

7.title: Boarding the Ferry to Fidalgo
7.plot: A couple that grew up on Fidalgo Island in Washington now wants their children to have the same childhood experiences. They decide to board a ferry to the island to hopefully find the house of their dreams.

8.title: San Diego to Whidbey Island, WA
8.plot: After a career in the Navy, an officer is looking to move with his family. They want to find a place with unrivaled natural beauty on the West Coast and decide to look for a home with plenty of land on Whidbey Island, Washington.

9.title: East Hampton House Search
9.plot: A Brooklyn-born woman loves NYC but has grown tired of the urban chaos. After many summers of vacationing in East Hampton with her friends, she's ready to purchase her own stylish island retreat where she can relax with her dog.

10.title: Waffle Time on Emerald Isle
10.plot: High school sweethearts are ready to move their family and waffle business to beautiful Emerald Isle, NC. They want a four-bedroom house close to the beach, while their two kids want a backyard skate park and waterslide.

11.title: Returning to Coronado Island
11.plot: A Florida family of four is ready to move to her native San Diego area to share the experiences she had growing up. They're looking for an oceanfront property on Coronado Island that has everything their family needs.

12.title: Mainland to Catalina Island
12.plot: A family of six from Long Beach, CA, hopes to find an island home with great architectural style and an ocean view in the Catalina Island town of Avalon.

13.title: Boats, Brews and Marsh Views on St. Helena, South Carolina
13.plot: After a recent visit to St. Helena, SC, a couple of world travelers realized they could get palm trees and beautiful beaches just three hours away from their family. They're hoping to downsize to a house with a large backyard.

14.title: A New Life on James Island
14.plot: A newly engaged couple wants to start their new life on peaceful James Island, SC. Having visited the island frequently as college students, they feel that it's the perfect place to get married, buy a house and start a family.

1.title: Swapping Buffalo Blues for South African Views in Key West
1.plot: A Buffalo, New York, man hopes to find a stateside taste of South Africa in the Old Town region of Key West, Florida.

2.title: Trading Chilly Pennsylvania for Fun in the Key West Sun
2.plot: A Pennsylvania couple wants to trade the bitter cold for sunny Key West. They're hoping to find a four-bedroom house in the Conch Republic with a pool, an open floor plan and plenty of space.

6.title: Making the Move to Merritt Island for Life on the Water
6.plot: A Pensacola, Florida, family makes the move to beautiful Merritt Island hoping to live right on the water with a dock in the backyard and a swimming pool for the kids.

7.title: Close Encounters with the Catfish Kind on South Padre Island
7.plot: A Denton, Texas, family of five hopes to find a large home with bedrooms for everyone and a pool all within walking distance to the beach in South Padre Island.

11.title: Planting Roots on North Carolina's Outer Banks
11.plot: A family of five is excited to leave Virginia Beach and plant roots on North Carolina's Outer Banks. After being the family's go-to vacation spot for years, they hope to find a large home with coastal charm and water views.

12.title: Views of the Sand Dunes
12.plot: A Pennsylvania family is ready to leave snowy winters behind for the sandy beaches and small town atmosphere of North Carolina's Outer Banks.

13.title: Goodbye to the Grind and Hello to Pensacola Beach
13.plot: After 20 years living in Atlanta, a couple is tired of the big city grind and is ready to make the move to Pensacola Beach, Florida.

14.title: Returning to Fidalgo Island

imdb.plot outline: Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. This shows follows everyday families in search of their own slice of paradise, and proves that fantasy can be reality.
imdb.title: Island Life
plot: Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. This shows follows everyday families in search of their own slice of paradise, and proves that fantasy can be reality.
